Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, five lines of text containing a duplicate of the 'Satire of Trades', P. Sallier II 10, 2-3 / part of 'Teaching of Khety'. Between line four and line five a date is written in red.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J. J. Černy and A.H. Gardiner, ‘Hieratic Ostraca’ (Oxford 1957), p. 12 and pl. XL, 3; W. Helck, ‘Die Lehre des Dwʒ ẖtjj’, Kleine ägyptische Texte (Wiesbaden, 1970), p. 5, no. 83. For edition of the Teaching of Khety (so-called Satire on Trades): S. Jäger Altägyptische Berufstypologien (Lingua Aegyptia Studia Monographica 4, 2004). Translation : Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and Other Ancient Egyptian Poems 1940–1649 BC. (Oxford World’s Classics 1999), 273-83.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393763) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393763)
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
Associated titles: Associated Title: Satire on the Trades
